availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Clark (Fleming County, Kentucky, commercial merchant)

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, commercial merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Jane Clark. Father of Virginia Q. D. Clark, Lucinda Clark, Allice Clark, James William Clark, John A. Clark, and Charles Clark. Commercial merchant in Fleming County in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, District 1, p. 120. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, Hillsboro, p. 2.
